author: Charlotta Bävholm

text: BGM is trivial? Sir, you've got it completely backwards. BGM is what makes the mood what it is. If you played a game that was completely silent, there would be no emotion. Without sad music, the scene wouldn't be sad. Without scary music, you wouldn't be frightened. Without happy music, you wouldn't be happy. People don't realize how important video game music is to every part of a game. That's why VGM is so amazing <3
author: Mayakanai

text: cant believe they would spare such an awesome theme for something so trivial as BGM

text: the storm peaks theme is the best piece of music in wow, really. Really awesome theme that fits so perfectly with the epic enviroment! and the part that begins around 1:52 or so is really wonderful!
